tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE travel_data (
    trip_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id UUID NOT NULL,
    trip_date DATE NOT NULL,
    destination VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    trip_cost DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE travel_records (
    travel_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    destination VARCHAR(255),
    travel_date DATE,
    distance_traveled FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE customer_info (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    policy_type VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Travelers (
  traveler_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  traveler_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  traveler_age INT,
  traveler_gender VARCHAR(10),
  traveler_country VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE Trips (
  trip_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  traveler_id UUID REFERENCES Travelers(traveler_id),
  trip_destination VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  trip_start_date DATE,
  trip_end_date DATE,
  trip_duration INT,
  trip_cost DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE InsuranceOffers (
  offer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  offer_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  offer_coverage VARCHAR(100),
  offer_discount DECIMAL(5, 2),
  offer_validity_period INT
)

CREATE TABLE Travel_Insurance_Customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name TEXT,
    customer_age INT,
    customer_gender TEXT,
    customer_email TEXT,
    customer_phone_number TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Travel_Destinations (
    destination_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    destination_name TEXT,
    destination_country TEXT,
    destination_rating INT,
    destination_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Travel_Insurance_Policies (
    policy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_type TEXT,
    policy_coverage TEXT,
    policy_price DECIMAL,
    policy_start_date DATE,
    policy_end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Travel_Insurance_Claims (
    claim_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_id INT,
    claim_date DATE,
    claim_description TEXT,
    claim_amount DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE travel_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    traveler_id INT,
    travel_date DATE,
    source_location VARCHAR(50),
    destination_location VARCHAR(50),
    travel_distance FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE traveler_info (
    traveler_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    traveler_name VARCHAR(50),
    traveler_age INT,
    traveler_email VARCHAR(50),
    traveler_phone VARCHAR(15)
)

CREATE TABLE popular_destinations (
    destination_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    destination_name VARCHAR(50),
    region VARCHAR(50),
    rating FLOAT,
    num_visits INT
)

CREATE TABLE insurance_offers (
    offer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    offer_type VARCHAR(50),
    coverage_details VARCHAR(255),
    premium_amount FLOAT,
    validity_period INT
)

CREATE TABLE customer_feedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    traveler_id INT,
    feedback_message TEXT,
    rating INT,
    feedback_date DATE
)
